column3: You can disable the whitespace changes for review (e.g. on GitHub web view with https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12820/commits/136084470cd7920b94e016621ebf682996247162?w=1)

Tested ACK 136084470cd7920b94e016621ebf682996247162\n\nLooks like it works. We can remove the help text for the non-existent `-fuzzmessagestest` (removed in ea3326891d8c3dcbcff178b618108d657c5586a3)
Oh, I wasn't suggesting we needed to do it here, but sure why not. Tested ACK 0c17e27630ada2d9284e357cc0e92ffff8775423
Concept ACK, eventually this script will be unnecessary when the arguments are registered alongside their help text btw
